description:
In this course titled 'Hypnosis – Eliminate Constipation With Self Hypnosis' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

What is Constipation?

1) Constipation is the difficult or infrequent passage of feces out of the body.

  • 2.Causes of PMS:
  • 1) Insufficient amounts of fiber and fluids in the diet
  • 2) Lack of exercise
  • 3) Muscle disorder
  • 4) Ageing
  • 5) Structural abnormalities
  • 6) Anti-depressants
  • 7) Continuous stress
  • 3.Consequences of Constipation: Harmful toxins and bacteria may develop causing"
  • 1) Body odor
  • 2) Gas
  • 3) Fatigue
  • 4) Indigestion
  • 5) Bloating
  • 6) Insomnia
  • 7) Headaches
  • 8) Obesity
  • 9) Thyroid disease
  • 4.How Self Hypnosis Can Help?
  • 1) Self hypnosis helps you to relax and calm down
  • 2) Self hypnosis helps maintain positive attitude
  • 3) Self hypnosis treats stress, anxiety, nervousness and depression successfully

This course is a must for those women who are psychologically suffering from the symptoms of constipation and want to get rid of it mentally and physically.

It is ideal for those who are suffering from constipation and its symptoms..

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 9 lectures in English including bonus.

This course contains-

Lecture1:Introduction

ecture2:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture3:Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture4:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture5:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture6:Guided Visualization Exercise: Get Inner Strength.

Lecture7:Guided Visualization Exercise: Eliminate The Problem Of Constipation.

Lecture8:Summary

Lecture 9:Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity
title: Hypnosis – Eliminate Constipation With Self Hypnosis
